content: archived pdf http //web archive org/web/20100925193253/http //caron com/projects/br/br10_posy_mesh_sc pdf materials caron international s simply soft 1 skein color #9727 black caron international s simply soft brites 1 skein ea # 9604 watermelon #9606 lemonade #9607 limelight #9610 grape and #9605 mango *ed note total yardage needed will depend on how many colors are used for the flowers less than a full skein of each color is needed for the flowers * h crochet hook yarn needle stitch net stitch flowers scarf is worked in net pattern make 5 flowers each in 3 color combinations flowers are worked in 4 rounds scatter flowers along net and sew down randomly but evenly make 8 fringe across both ends to finish **** 8/11/21 this pattern is also in boye publication #6397 i taught myself crochet 2008 page 27 design credit is given to kim biddix in this publication
